snippet: Tennis Australia (TA) and the Australian Olympic Committee appear to be headed for a showdown over Nick Kyrgios for the Rio Games after the 21-year-old was publicly backed by his sport's governing body on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Tennis Australia (TA) and the Australian Olympic Committee appear to be headed for a showdown over Nick Kyrgios for the Rio Games after the 21-year-old was publicly backed by his sport's governing body on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Tennis Australia Back Kyrgios Over Behavior Criticism
headline.main: Tennis Australia Back Kyrgios Over Behavior Criticism
